import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-store-page', templateUrl: './store-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./store-page.component.scss'] }) export class StorePageComponent { storeNames = ['Mesa | Country Club', 'Store 2', 'Store 3', 'Store 4']; storeManager = ['Jaysen Northern', 'Manager 2', 'Manager 3', 'Manager 4']; storeHours = ['helloworld', 'Hours 2', 'Hours 3', 'Hours 4']; storeAddress = ['1440 S.
